quotes.text: ...What People Call 'Love' Is Just A Chemical Reaction That Compels Animals To Breed. It Hits Hard, Morty, Then It Slowly Fades, Leaving You Stranded In A Failing Marriage.
Because I Don't Respect Therapy. Because I'm A Scientist. Because I Invent, Transform, Create, And Destroy For A Living, And When I Don't Like Something About The World, I Change It.
You Act Like Prey, But You're A Predator! You Use Pity To Lure In Your Victims! That's How You Survive!
The universe is basically an animal. It grazes on the ordinary. It creates infinite idiots just to eat them.
To live is to risk it all; otherwise you’re just an inert chunk of randomly assembled molecules drifting wherever the universe blows you…
Sometimes Science Is More Art Than Science.
You Still Have A Right To Take Anything You Want Seriously.
YWeddings Are Basically Funerals With Cake.
If I Wanted To Be Sober, I Wouldn't Have Gotten Drunk.
If You Spend All Day Shuffling Words Around, You Can Make Anything Sound Bad, Morty.
